title: Are there any plans to nerf Leona?
body: She's sitting at a 54% winrate and a 15% pickrate aswell as being the top support. I know it's aftershock doing this to her but she's basically completely overbearing atm and I think she needs to be toned down. Because as it stand right now it's extremely difficult to punish her for going in on someone with the massive amounts of resistance she's getting from after shock stacking with her W not to mention her already extremely potent lockdown capabilities.

replies.body: Even before aftershock, she was incredibly tanky brickwall entire early game with that W and did moderate damage, so I am not surprised that aftershock broke her.

The thing is Riot has to pick, lower her damage or increase CD on E.

or

Nerf aftershock and leave her alone.

Leona's kit is very risky to toy with because she's all engage.
Go to Google, search up "Surrender at 20". Click on the link that shows up, check out patch notes.
Pretty sure she already got nerfed twice in the last couple patches.
